properties.buildingDescription:
Welcome to Applewood in Lethbridge!   

Find peace and comfort with Applewood and enjoy weekends exploring all the Lethbridge area has to offer you. Conveniently located close to parks, schools, shopping, restaurants, and other amenities, life awaits you at Applewood.  
 

When you rent with Avenue Living Communities, you’re choosing the advantage. Enjoy…   

  • Pet friendly communities 
  • 24-hour resident service   
  • Three-day maintenance turnaround   
  • Professional cleaning & landscaping   
  • On-site management team 
  • Refer-a-friend program 
  • AND even more benefits that make renting with us simple!   
     

Special Offers:  

  • FREE UTILITIES!
  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase 
     

Suite & Building:   

  • Bachelor, and one-bedroom suites  
  • Spacious and bright living rooms 
  • Suites come with appliances such as stove and fridge  
  • In-suite storage 
  • Balconies  
  • Heat, water, and electricity included  
  • Surface parking: $25/month 
     

Neighbourhood:   

  • Short drive to Highways 3, 5 and 4, downtown, and close to bus stops and public transit  
  • Quick access to Nikka Yuko Japanese Garden, Henderson Lake, Bull Trail Park North, and Old Man River  
  • Short drive to Park Place Mall, College Centre Mall, Real Canadian Superstore, Costco Wholesale, Walmart Supercentre, and Save-On-Foods 
  • Close distance to University of Lethbridge and Lethbridge College 
  • Nearby fitness and recreation facilities and Oldman Dam Provincial Recreation Area 
  • Close to Chinook Regional Hospital and St. Michael’s Health Centre 
     

Imagine home. It’s your safe and comfortable place to create unforgettable moments.  

Move in today. And when you do, there’s always someone looking out for you, supporting you along the way.

properties.name: Borden Place Apartments
properties.buildingDescription:
865 Confederation Dr. Saskatoon, Sask.

Phone: (306) 500.1915

Welcome to Borden Place Apartments in Saskatoon! 

Perfect for working people and all families, Borden Place Apartments is conveniently situated in the neighbourhood of Confederation, with schools, shopping, recreation centres, and restaurants nearby.

Special Offers:  

  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase

When you rent with Avenue Living Communities, you’re choosing the advantage. Enjoy… 

  • 24-hour resident service 
  • Three-day maintenance turnaround 
  • Professional cleaning & landscaping 
  • On-site management team
  • Refer-a-friend program
  • AND even more benefits that make renting with us simple!

Suite & Building: 

  • Expansive bachelor, one-, and two-bedroom apartments
  • Spacious living room space for families
  • Pet-friendly properties in all our communities
  • Modernized suites,  balcony railing with open sky view
  • All suites  complete with new appliances including stove, fridge, air conditioning, and in-suite storage
  • On-site laundry located on main floor for simple living – three washers and dryers  in each building
  • Safety and security with cameras across all entrances  
  • Energized parking available within the building complex for $15 month

Neighbourhood: 

  • Borden Place Apartments are part of a larger neighbourhood community in Confederation offering a variety of suite types for all of life’s stages
  • Confederation is walking distance to Superstore and Confederation Mall, with the central bus terminal near Borden Place 
  • Close to Shaw Centre and Cosmos Civic Centre, which has a library, basketball court, and recreational indoor hall space available
  • Nearby Vincent Massey Community School, Bishop Klein School, Bishop Roborecki School, Bethlehem High School, and Tommy Douglas High School, with public transit available
  • Downtown is 15-20 minutes, with a bus stop in front of the building
  • Conveniently located with a short distance from the shopping and strip mall which includes JYSK, Dollarama, Canadian Tire, RBC Bank, BMO, CIBC, and McDonald’s

Imagine home. It’s your safe and comfortable place to create unforgettable moments.

Move-in today. And when you do, there’s always someone looking out for you, supporting you along the way. 



Location Details
  • Vincent Massey Community School
  • Bishop Klein School
  • Bishop Roborecki School
  • St. Paul's Hospital
  • Confederation Bus Terminal
  • Confederation Mall, Plaza 22 Strip Mall
  • Freshco, JYSK, Dollarama, Canadian Tire, McDonald's
  • RBC, BMO & CIBC banks

properties.name: Arbor Green
properties.buildingDescription:
3730 Diefenbaker Dr. Saskatoon, Sask.

Phone (306) 500.7758

Welcome to Arbor Green in Saskatoon! 

Settle in at the Arbor Green. This cozy community-oriented building in a quiet neighbourhood is perfect for mid-size families, and students with roommates. Located close to two parks, shopping, restaurants, and amenities, Arbor Green is waiting for you.

Special Offers:  

  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase

When you rent with Avenue Living Communities, you’re choosing the advantage. Enjoy… 

  • 24-hour resident service 
  • Three-day maintenance turnaround 
  • Professional cleaning & landscaping 
  • On-site management team
  • Refer-a-friend program
  • AND even more benefits that make renting with us simple! 

Suite & Building: 

  • Two-bedroom, updated suites
  • Large balconies with open sky view
  • All Avenue Living Communities buildings are pet-friendly
  • Spacious living rooms and well-lit suites with lots of storage space
  • Brand new appliances including stove, fridge, air conditioning, and dishwasher (select suites)
  • Onsite laundry located on second floor of each building – two washers, two dryers
  • Energized parking available at complex for $15/month
  • Updated paint on building exterior
  • Building monitored by security cameras across all entrances
  • Open garden and greenspace between buildings for residents to walk and play

Neighbourhood: 

  • Arbor Green is close to the communities of Kensington and Pacific Heights, offering many schools and churches in the area
  • Churches include Life Baptist Church, West Gate Alliance Church, and St. Patrick Parish Church
  • Schools in the area include Bishop Roborecki Primary School, Confederation Pack Elementary School, Lester B. Pearson Elementary School, and Father Vachon School
  • Explore the scenic Pacific Park and Atlantic Park, with open green spaces and sport fields
  • Arbor Green is close to Confederation Suburban Centre, which also contains Confederation Park Mall, Cosmic Civic Centre, Plaza 22, and Carlyle King Library
  • Quick access to Real Canadian Superstore, and short drives to Shaw Centre and Blairmore Suburban Centre
  • Bus stop (16 and 65) directly opposite Arbor Green, which takes you to Downtown Saskatoon

Imagine home. It’s your safe and comfortable place to create unforgettable moments.

Move-in today. And when you do, there’s always someone looking out for you, supporting you along the way. 



Location Details
  • Confederation Mall
  • Real Canadian Superstore
  • Dundonald School
  • Confederation Park Community School
  • St. Paul's Hospital
  • Saskatoon City Hospital

  • Building is close to colleges and universities such as University of Winnipeg, Commonwealth College, Northlands College, CDI College, Red River Community College, Robertson College, and CHN College 
  • Five minute walk to downtown Winnipeg

  • Many churches in the area, including Calvary Temple, United Church of Canada, Knox United Church, St. Mary Cathedral, Holy Trinity Anglican Church, and more 
  • Close to science health centre and five minutes away from nearest hospital 
  • Short distance to entertainment venues such as MTS Centre and Market Square 
  • Close to Portage Place Mall and other restaurants and amenities  

Imagine home. It’s your safe and comfortable place to create unforgettable moments.   

Move in today. And when you do, there’s always someone looking out for you, supporting you along the way.

properties.name: Ashford Manor
properties.buildingDescription:
Welcome to Ashford Manor in Saskatoon!


Is the drive home from work longer than you'd like? Because it's not when you're only blocks away from Circle Drive. That's Ashford Manor, tucked away, but moments from everything you need.

At Ashford Manor, forget everything you once knew about Meadowgreen, because this safe haven is the true hub of your life in Saskatoon.

You deserve more free time. And that's what you'll get when you're moments from major road networks for quick and easy travel to work, and to your local shopping amenities at Confederation Mall. You're a short walk outside from enjoying your weekends at Fred Mendel Park, Kate Waygood Park, and Meadowgreen Park.

Home is supposed to be safe and comfortable, right? Well, we invest in you. That means upgrading properties from the front door all the way to your bedroom, so you can enjoy the comforts of what it means to be home.

Do you live in the now? Ashford Manor does too. But it's not just modern visual appeal that brings comfort. It's safety. Safety in modern security features from exterior lighting to light your way home. All the way to regular security patrols and security cameras so your home can truly be a haven.

If you want convenience, modern interiors, and a home that's safe and secure, Ashford Manor is home.

But don't just take our word for it, experience it for yourself. Book a showing today online or call 1-855-247-1492. We're now offering same-day virtual viewings via video call software of your choice. So you can go from starting your search, to finding your home, to moving in, quickly and safely.
 

Special Offers:

  • Get your first month free on a 13-month lease (select units only)
  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase

  • 1 bedroom
  • 2 bedroom

  • Surface parking: $25/month


Key Details:

  • Pet friendly
  • Air conditioning
  • Suite comes with balcony
  • Patrolled exterior parking on fresh surfaces
  • Within walking distance to schools and community parks
  • Modern security features like lighting, cameras, and patrols
  • Moments from Confederation Mall and other shopping amenities

properties.name: Steven Manor
properties.buildingDescription:
Welcome to Steven Manor in Edmonton!   

Find peace and comfort with Steven Manor and enjoy weekends exploring all that Edmonton has to offer you. Conveniently located close to Edmonton’s sprawling River Valley, parks, walking trails, schools, shopping, restaurants, and other amenities, downtown life awaits you at Steven Manor.  
 

When you rent with Avenue Living Communities, you’re choosing the advantage. Enjoy…   

  • Pet friendly communities 
  • 24-hour resident service   
  • Three-day maintenance turnaround   
  • Professional cleaning & landscaping   
  • On-site management team 
  • Refer-a-friend program 
  • AND even more benefits that make renting with us simple!   
     

Special Offers:  

  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase.
  • Exclusive TELUS offer: Save 25 per cent on any Internet tier and Optik TV products as an ALC resident in Alberta.
    Plus, enjoy fast fibre optic internet speeds in this property.
     

Suite & Building:   

  • One-bedroom suites  
  • Spacious and bright living rooms 
  • Suites come with appliances such as stove and fridge  
  • Heat and water included  
  • Surface parking: $15/month 
     

Neighbourhood:   

  • Close to Central train station and bus stops, and short drive to Yellowhead Trail 
  • Quick access to Central McDougall Park, McCauley Community Garden, and the 104th Avenue Off-Lease Dog Park 
  • Short drive to Campio Brewing, Save-On-Foods, Cactus Club, Kingsway Mall, MOXIES Kingsway 
  • Within proximity to Athabasca University and Bredin College  
  • Nearby fitness and recreation facilities, Rogers Place, Royal Alberta Museum, Art Gallery of Alberta 
  • Close to Royal Alexandra Hospital, MacEwan University Health Centre, City Centre Medical Clinic and Pharmacy 
     

Imagine home. It’s your safe and comfortable place to create unforgettable moments.  

Move in today. And when you do, there’s always someone looking out for you, supporting you along the way. 
 



Location Details
  • Oliver Square
  • Edmonton City Centre
  • Victoria School
  • Riverdale School
  • Royal Alexandria Hospital
  • Edmonton General Continuing Care

properties.name: River Vista
properties.buildingDescription:
Welcome to River Vista in Edmonton!   

Find peace and security with River Vista and enjoy weekends exploring all that Edmonton has to offer you. Conveniently located close to Edmonton’s parks and River Valley, walking trails, schools, shopping, restaurants, and other amenities, outdoor life and adventure awaits you at River Vista.  
 

When you rent with Avenue Living Communities, you’re choosing the advantage. Enjoy…   

  • Pet friendly communities 
  • 24-hour resident service   
  • Three-day maintenance turnaround   
  • Professional cleaning & landscaping   
  • On-site management team 
  • Refer-a-friend program 
  • AND even more benefits that make renting with us simple!   
     

Special Offers:  

  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase 
  • Exclusive TELUS offer: Save 25 per cent on any Internet tier and Optik TV products.
    Plus, enjoy fast fibre optic internet speeds in this property.  

Suite & Building:   

  • One-, and two-bedroom suites  
  • Spacious and bright living rooms 
  • Suites come with appliances such as stove and fridge 
  • Renovated common areas 
  • Heat and water included  
  • Surface parking: $15/month 
     

Neighbourhood:   

  • Short drive to Yellowhead Trail, Anthony Henday Trail, Wayne Gretzky Drive, Stadium LRT train station, and nearby multitude of bus stops 
  • Quick access to Dawson Park, Kinnaird Park, Borden Park, Muttart Conservatory, and Forest Heights Park  
  • Close to Edmonton’s famous downtown food scene and many restaurants, Save-On-Foods, Stadium Foods, and Arden’s Variety Food Mart 
  • Within proximity to University of Alberta, Athabasca University, NAIT, and Bredin College  
  • Nearby fitness and recreation facilities, Londonderry Fitness and Leisure Centre, Commonwealth Stadium, Rogers Place, Royal Alberta Museum, Edmonton EXPO Centre, Edmonton Public Library – Capilano, and Art Gallery of Alberta 
  • Close to Royal Alexandra Hospital, MacEwan University Health Centre, City Centre Medical Clinic and Pharmacy 
     

Imagine home. It’s your safe and comfortable place to create unforgettable moments.  

Move in today. And when you do, there’s always someone looking out for you, supporting you along the way.

Welcome to Fairway Plaza in Medicine Hat!   

Find peace and comfort with Fairway Plaza and enjoy weekends exploring all the Medicine Hat area has to offer you. Conveniently located close to Medicine Hat College, parks, walking trails, schools, shopping, restaurants, and other amenities, life awaits you at Fairway Plaza.  
 

When you rent with Avenue Living Communities, you’re choosing the advantage. Enjoy…   

  • Pet friendly communities 
  • 24-hour resident service   
  • Three-day maintenance turnaround   
  • Professional cleaning & landscaping   
  • On-site management team 
  • Refer-a-friend program 
  • AND even more benefits that make renting with us simple!

  • Bachelor, one, and two-bedroom suites

  • Suites come with appliances such as stove and fridge

  • Heat, water, and electricity included  
  • Surface parking: $25/month

  • Short drive to Walmart Supercentre, Shoppers Drug Mart, London Drugs, Real Canadian Superstore, Moxies Medicine Hat, Earls Kitchen + Bar, and Medicine Hat Mall  
  • Nearby fitness and recreation facilities, Crestwood Recreation Centre, and Medicine Hat Exhibition & Stampede 
  • Close to Medicine Hat Regional Hospital, Riverview Long Term Care and ACT Medical Centre Medicine Hat 
     

Imagine home. It’s your safe and comfortable place to create unforgettable moments.  

Move in today. And when you do, there’s always someone looking out for you, supporting you along the way.

properties.name: Brook Manor
properties.buildingDescription:
Welcome to Brook Manor in Edmonton!   

Find peace and security with Brook Manor and enjoy weekends exploring all that Edmonton has to offer you. Conveniently located close to Edmonton’s sprawling River Valley, parks, walking trails, schools, shopping, restaurants, and other amenities, life awaits you at Brook Manor.  
 

When you rent with Avenue Living Communities, you’re choosing the advantage. Enjoy…   

  • Pet friendly communities 
  • 24-hour resident service   
  • Three-day maintenance turnaround   
  • Professional cleaning & landscaping   
  • On-site management team 
  • Refer-a-friend program 
  • AND even more benefits that make renting with us simple!   
     

Special Offers:  

  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase 
  • Exclusive TELUS offer: Save 25 per cent on any Internet tier and Optik TV products as an ALC resident in Alberta.
     

Suite & Building:   

  • Bachelor, and one-bedroom suites  
  • Spacious and bright living rooms 
  • Suites come with appliances such as stove and fridge – stainless steel options available 
  • Dishwasher available 
  • Balconies 
  • Heat and water included  
  • Surface parking: $15/month 
     

Neighbourhood:   

  • Short drive to Anthony Henday Drive, Yellowhead Trail, and nearby 66 Street and 118 Avenue bus stop 
  • Quick access to Delton Park, Borden Park, Izena Ross Park, Highlands Park, and Capilano Foot Bridge  
  • Close to Parkdale Square, Delton Grocery, Real Canadian Superstore, Walmart Supercentre, Winners, Safeway Coliseum, Coliseum Steak and Pizza, and Save-On-Foods 
  • Within proximity to University of Alberta, Athabasca University, and Bredin College  
  • Nearby fitness and recreation facilities, Commonwealth Stadium, Rogers Place, Royal Alberta Museum, Edmonton EXPO Centre, Edmonton Public Library – Capilano, and Art Gallery of Alberta 
  • Close to Royal Alexandra Hospital, MacEwan University Health Centre, City Centre Medical Clinic and Pharmacy 
     

Imagine home. It’s your safe and comfortable place to create unforgettable moments.  

Move in today. And when you do, there’s always someone looking out for you, supporting you along the way.

properties.name: Spruce Manor
properties.buildingDescription:
Welcome to Spruce Manor in Regina!

Special Offers:  

  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase

Quiet, suburban, and within quick access to all the things you need. These 2-bedroom apartments are the perfect place to settle with your family. As you take your first steps in Spruce Manor from common areas to bedrooms, you'll immediately notice modern, updated interiors from new flooring to fresh coats of paint. The cozy atmosphere at home is always inviting but it's not the only thing that makes you feel comfortable. This safe residential neighbourhood is great for walks to the things you need. Enjoy the convenience of amenities only blocks away, and schools from kindergarten to high school as your children grow. Security cameras give you an added peace of mind, monitored 24/7 for unusual activity. And if you have a vehicle, it's parked just outside your window, plugged in on cold winter evenings ready for your morning commute.

Don't just take our word for it. View Spruce Manor for yourself and see if it's the perfect place for your long-term home! Book a showing online or call 1-855-247-1492 and speak to a friendly Resident Experience Specialist to help you along.
 

Suite Types:

  • 2-bedroom
     

Parking:

  • Surface parking: $15/month
     

Key Details:

  • Pet-friendly property
  • Safe residential, suburban atmosphere
  • Public transit stops just outside the property
  • Convenience of amenities within a short walk
  • Stay long-term in this family-oriented community
  • Moving to Canada? Room to accommodate your whole family
  • Great quality-of-life upgrades from common areas to bedrooms
  • Safe and secure property with 24/7 monitored security cameras
  • Perfect for families with children as schools are only blocks away
  • Shared laundry facilities, well-placed centrally on the second floor
  • Enjoy powered outdoor parking within view from your apartment window
  • Local teams looking out for you to ensure you feel safe and comfortable at home
  • Quick access to major road networks like Ring Road and Highway 6 for easy commutes

properties.name: Highwood Apartments
properties.buildingDescription:
Welcome to Highwood Apartments in Red Deer!   

Find comfort and relaxation with Highwood Apartments. Located in Red Deer, enjoy weekends exploring all that the Red Deer area has to offer you. Conveniently located close to rivers, parks, schools, shopping, restaurants, and other amenities, life awaits you at Highwood Apartments.  
 

When you rent with Avenue Living Communities, you’re choosing the advantage. Enjoy…   

  • Pet friendly communities 
  • 24-hour resident service   
  • Three-day maintenance turnaround   
  • Professional cleaning & landscaping   
  • On-site management team 
  • Refer-a-friend program 
  • AND even more benefits that make renting with us simple!   
     

Special Offers:  

  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase 
  • Exclusive TELUS Offer: Save 25% on any Internet tier and Optik TV products as an ALC resident in Alberta 
     

Suite & Building:   

  • Bachelor, one-, two-, and three-bedroom suites – newly renovated 
  • Spacious living rooms  
  • Suites come with appliances such as stove and fridge 
  • In-suite storage  
  • Balconies with park views 
  • Heat and water included 
  • Surface parking: $15/month 
     

Neighbourhood:   

  • Quick access to QEII Highway, Riverview Park, Kerry Wood Nature Centre, and Red Deer River 
  • Short drive to Real Canadian Superstore, Walmart, M&M Food Market 
  • Easy access to Parkland Mall, Red Deer Museum and Art Gallery 
  • Nearby fitness and recreation facilities, Zen Den, and Totally Refreshed Steam and Spa 
  • Close to Red Deer Regional Hospital Centre, and Taylor North Medical and Walk-In Clinic  
     

Imagine home. It’s your safe and comfortable place to create unforgettable moments.  

Move in today. And when you do, there’s always someone looking out for you, supporting you along the way.

 



Location Details
  • Village Mall
  • Parkland Mall
  • North Cottage High School
  • G.H. Dawe School
  • Red Deer Regional Hospital Centre

properties.name: Chancellor Gate
properties.buildingDescription:
403 Pendygrasse Rd., Saskatoon, Sask.

Phone: (306) 500.1122

Welcome to Chancellor Gate in Saskatoon! 

Find your space at Chancellor Gate in the desirable neighbourhood of Fairhaven and Parkridge. With a bus stop out front for quick commuting, easy access to schools, amenities, grocery stores, and close to two parks, Chancellor Gate is perfect for working people and families.

Special Offers:  

  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase

SaskTel internet included.


When you rent with Avenue Living Communities, you’re choosing the advantage. Enjoy… 

  • 24-hour resident service 
  • Three-day maintenance turnaround 
  • Professional cleaning & landscaping 
  • On-site management team
  • Refer-a-friend program
  • AND even more benefits that make renting with us simple!

Suite & Building: 

  • One, two, and three-bedroom suites
  • Pet-friendly, spacious living rooms, and well-lit suites
  • Modernized suites with all new appliances including updated stoves, fridges, dishwashers, and air conditioning
  • Large balcony spaces with open-sky views, access to natural light
  • On-site laundry (two washers, two dryers) located on main floor
  • Powered parking available for $15 per month
  • Exclusive playground with modern swing and slides, and a small gazebo to enjoy

Neighbourhood: 

  • Easy access to St. Mark Elementary School, Fairhaven Elementary School, St. Margaret Elementary School, Bethlehem Catholic High School, and Tommy Douglas High School
  • Short distance to grocery stores such as Superstore, Walmart, and FreshCo
  • Near two surrounding parks, William Reid Park and Herbert Spears Park
  • Close to St. Paul’s Hospital, Shaw Centre, which provides indoor sport facilities, and Cosmos Civic Centre, which includes a library, basketball court, and recreational rental indoor hall space
  • Within proximity to Park Ridge Old Age Care Facility
  • Access to a bus stop right out front of building with multiple routes
  • Downtown access in 15-20 minutes

Imagine home. It’s your safe and comfortable place to create unforgettable moments.

Move-in today. And when you do, there’s always someone looking out for you, supporting you along the way.

  • Tommy Douglas High School
  • Confederation Bus Terminal

  • Superstore, Walmart & Freshco

properties.name: The Barnhart
properties.buildingDescription:
1121 6 St. SW, Calgary, AB

Phone: (825) 253.5690
 

Welcome to The Barnhart in Calgary!

Call your home a piece of history in the historic Barnhart building. Built in the late 1920s during the Great Depression, Barnhart is over 100 years old and one of Calgary’s most vintage apartment buildings.

True to its unique and original style, and perfectly situated in the trendy Beltline community. Barnhart is conveniently located close to amenities such as grocery stores, cafes, restaurants, and entertainment venues. It neighbours large green spaces and parks along the Elbow River, providing easy access to pathways and trails.  
 

When you rent with Avenue Living Communities, you’re choosing the advantage. Enjoy…  

  • 24-hour resident service

  • Subway tiles, black and white checker flooring, beautiful archways, electric fireplace


Neighbourhood:  

  • Indulge your creative mindset and artistic flair in the Beltline, one of Calgary’s trendiest inner-city neighbourhoods, and adaptable for all lifestyles and occupations
  • Dine at local restaurants and cafes and shop at local businesses
  • Explore Beltline’s unique access to scenic trails along the Elbow River, and close to Lindsay Park and Stanley Park
  • Bike/walking access to nearby schools, grocery stores, amenities, parks, playgrounds, Talisman Centre, and hospital nearby
  • Quick access to transit and bus stops, and short distance to LRT
  • Street parking and conveniently located close to Macleod Trail, Elbow Drive, and downtown

properties.buildingDescription:
Welcome to Lakewood Manor in Saskatoon!

Special Offers:  

  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase

Finding a home that's right for you takes some time. Do you value peace, comfort, and convenience? And, how often do you find all three?

Lakewood Manor is not only the centre of everything you should need, it's tucked away on a quiet street. But within mere moments, you're driving on the highway towards the local Costco, a quick snack run at Shoppers Drug Mart, or walking your dog at Hyde Park.

Comfortable living is a home in the centre of everything you need, right?

Say goodbye to school runs, because the kids can walk, getting exercise every morning. These suites are loaded with storage space, so there's no tripping over left out toys as well.

Unlike most other apartments, the open floorplan from kitchen to living room creates the perfect atmosphere for family. Family dinners, family movie nights, family games. It has it all, peaceful, comfortable, convenient.

But, see it for yourself. Book a showing today online or call 1-855-247-1492. We're now offering same-day virtual viewings via video call software of your choice. So you can go from starting your search, to finding your home, to moving in, quickly and safely.

properties.name: Hays Farm
properties.buildingDescription:
Welcome to Hays Farm in Calgary!


When you want to escape the busy city, retreating to Hays Farm at the end of your day is always relaxing, peaceful, and what you need to reenergize. That's because this mature neighbourhood is blocks from McLeod Trail and Heritage LRT Station for simple commutes to work. And near all the amenities you need with Calgary's Chinook Centre less than 10 minutes away. When you do relax at home, there is greenspace all around for serene afternoons outdoors. Or sunbathe by the swimming pool after a game of tennis on the community courts. With eight buildings in the complex – and four operated as private condominiums – there is a pride of ownership in this community atmosphere.


Come experience it for yourself, and see why seniors, professionals, and young couples love to call Hays Farm their home. Book a showing simply online or call 1-855-247-1492 to speak to a friendly Resident Experience Specialist.


Special Offers:  

  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase 
  • Exclusive TELUS Offer: Save 25% on any Internet tier and Optik TV products as an ALC resident in Alberta. 


Suite Types:

  • 1 bedroom
  • 2 bedroom
     

Parking:

  • Surface parking: $45/month
     

Key Details:

  • Pet-friendly
  • Secure electronic entry into foyer
  • Powered level parking for each suite
  • Above ground level suites have balconies
  • Mature trees on vast surrounding greenspace  
  • Less than 10 minutes away from Chinook Centre
  • A perfect location for those who appreciate quiet 
  • Every unit comes with a fridge, stove, and dishwasher
  • Mature neighbourhood, mature area, mature community
  • Simple laundry day with on-site facilities in each building
  • Large 12-foot-wide staircases in two three-storey buildings
  • Heritage LRT Station is a 15-minute walk for easy commutes
  • Safe with lighting throughout the complex and 24-hour security cameras
  • Elevators for easy access to suites above the ground floor in two buildings
  • On-site amenities including a swimming pool and community tennis courts
  • Located between Elbow Drive and McLeod Trail for quick access to amenities
  • Easy for family to visit with access to major road networks and parking around the property

properties.name: Victoria Gardens
properties.buildingDescription:
Welcome to Victoria Gardens in Calgary, Income-Restricted Apartments for an affordable lifestyle, designed for renters with a low-income per household.

Experience simple comfortable living in affordable Income-Restricted Apartments for rent.


Special Offers:  

  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase 
  • Exclusive TELUS Offer: Save 25% on any Internet tier and Optik TV products as an ALC resident in Alberta.


Suite Types:

  • 1 bedroom
  • 2 bedroom


Key Details:

  • Pet friendly
  • Parking
  • Balconies
  • Quiet neighborhood
  • Close to downtown core



What's Income-Restricted?

The gross annual income of the household must be less than:

  • $44,000 (before tax) for a 1-bedroom
  • $54,000 (before tax) for a 2-bedroom
     

Applicants may not own any residential real estate within or outside of Canada at the time of application or during residency.

Sources of income include:

  • Wages/salary
  • Income support
  • Benefits (i.e. child, disability, pension)
  • Gratuities
  • Support payments (i.e. child, spousal)
  • Rent supplements
  • Any other income
     


Location Details
  • University of Calgary
  • CF Market Mall
  • Alberta's Children's Hospital
  • Foothills Medical Centre
  • Safeway Montgomery

properties.buildingDescription:
Welcome to Reid Estates Park in Saskatoon! 

Find your space at Reid Estates Park in the desirable neighbourhood of Fairhaven and Parkridge. With a bus stop out front for quick commuting, easy access to schools, amenities, grocery stores, and close to two parks, Reid Estates Park is perfect for working people and families looking to call Reid Estates Park home. 

When you rent with Avenue Living Communities, you’re choosing the advantage. Enjoy…    

  • Pet friendly communities  
  • 24-hour resident service 
  • Three-day maintenance turnaround    
  • Professional cleaning & landscaping    
  • Refer-a-friend program  
  • AND even more benefits that make renting with us simple!    

Special Offers:   

  • Get your first month free on a 13-month lease. (Select suites only)  
  • SaskTel internet included
  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase 

Suite & Building:    

  • One, two, and three-bedroom suites 
  • Spacious living rooms and well-lit suites 
  • Recently renovated suites with all new appliances including: 
  • New stoves, fridges, dishwashers, and air conditioning in suites 
  • Large balcony spaces with open-sky views, access to natural light 
  • On-site laundry (two washers, two dryers) located on main floor  
  • Admin staff at building site office to support and assist all residents  
  • Energized parking available for each resident at a monthly charge of $15 per month 
  • Exclusive playground with newly renovated swing and slides, and a small gazebo to enjoy 

Neighbourhood:    

  • Easy access to elementary schools St. Mark Elementary School, Fairhaven Elementary School, St. Margaret Elementary School, as well as two high schools, Bethlehem Catholic High School, and Tommy Douglas High School 
  • Short distance to grocery stores such as Superstore, Walmart, and Freshco 
  • Nearby two surrounding parks: William Reid Park, and Herbert Spears Park opposite the building 
  • Close to St. Paul’s Hospital, Shaw Center, which provides indoor sport facilities, and Cosmos Civic Center, which includes a library, basketball court, and recreational rental indoor hall space available 
  • Within proximity to Park Ridge Old Age Care Facility  
  • Access to a bus stop right out front of building with route numbers 9, 10, 60, 64, and 65 
  • Downtown access in 15-20 minutes 

Imagine home. It’s your safe and comfortable place to create unforgettable moments.  Move in today. And when you do, there’s always someone looking out for you, supporting you along the way.

properties.name: Sagecourt
properties.buildingDescription:
Welcome to Sagecourt in Strathmore!


Find comfort, peace and stability at Sagecourt. This family complex in Strathmore is in a quiet cul-de-sac near many local shopping and dining centers. Sagecourt is waiting to welcome you to a comfortable quiet space to create new memories.


When you rent with Avenue Living Communities, you’re choosing the advantage. Enjoy….   

  • 24-hour resident service  
  • Three-day maintenance turnaround  
  • Professional cleaning & landscaping  
  • On-site management team
  • Refer-a-friend program
  • AND even more benefits that make renting with us simple!  
     

Special Offers: 

  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by:  Zenbase
     

Suites & Building:  

  • One- and two-bedroom units
  • Modern kitchen with soft closing drawers
  • Units come with appliances (fridge, stove, microwave & dishwasher)
  • Private entrance
  • Vinyl flooring and carpet
  • Window coverings & temperature controls
  • Balcony / Patio
  • Washer & dryer
  • One surface parking stall included
  • Heat and water included
  • Not pet-friendly
     

Neighbourhood:  

  • Quiet neighbourhood minutes away from grocery stores
  • Close access to Strathmore Golf Club
  • Near many local elementary schools and high schools
  • Nearby Elmer and Phyllis Gray Park and recreational facilities
  • Quick abscess to Strathmore District Health Services
     

* THIS PROPERTY ALSO HAS INCOME-RESTRICTED UNITS AVAILABLE; SOME DETAILS MAY DIFFER DEPENDING ON THESE UNITS *


What's Income-Restricted?

The gross annual income of the household must be less than:

  • $32,500 (before tax) for a 1-bedroom
  • $45,500 (before tax) for a 2-bedroom
     

Imagine home. It’s your safe and comfortable place to create unforgettable moments. 

Move in today. And when you do, there’s always someone looking out for you, supporting you along the way.

properties.buildingDescription:
Welcome to Kelloway Crescent Townhomes in Red Deer!   

Find peace and relaxation with Kelloway Crescent Townhomes. Located in Red Deer, enjoy weekends exploring all that the Red Deer area has to offer you. Conveniently located close to rivers, parks, schools, shopping, restaurants, and other amenities, adventure awaits you at Kelloway Crescent Townhomes.  
 

When you rent with Avenue Living Communities, you’re choosing the advantage. Enjoy…   

  • Pet friendly communities 
  • 24-hour resident service   
  • Three-day maintenance turnaround   
  • Professional cleaning & landscaping   
  • On-site management team 
  • Refer-a-friend program 
  • AND even more benefits that make renting with us simple!   
     

Special Offers:  

  • Flexible rent payments available | Powered by: Zenbase 
  • Exclusive TELUS Offer: Save 25% on any Internet tier and Optik TV products as an ALC resident in Alberta 
     

Suite & Building:   

  • Three-bedroom suites  
  • Spacious living rooms with fireplace 
  • Suites come with appliances such as stove and fridge 
  • Dishwasher available 
  • In-suite washer and dryer 
  • In-suite storage with walk-in closets 
  • Unfinished basement 
  • Furnace 
  • Sun deck 
  • Fenced back yard and front yard maintained by Avenue Living  
  • Surface parking: $15/month 
     

Neighbourhood:   

  • Quick access to QEII Highway, Hazlett Lake, Kentwood Park, Discovery Canyon, and Red Deer River 
  • Short drive to Walmart Supercentre, Shoppers Drug Mart, Sobeys – Village Mall, and Save-On-Foods 
  • Short drive to Parkland Mall, Red Deer Museum and Art Gallery 
  • Nearby fitness and recreation facilities, Zen Den, and Totally Refreshed Steam and Spa 
  • Close to Red Deer Regional Hospital Centre, and Taylor North Medical and Walk-In Clinic  
     

Imagine home. It’s your safe and comfortable place to create unforgettable moments.  

Move in today. And when you do, there’s always someone looking out for you, supporting you along the way.
